title: Sound
body: When I am in champ select i have the music running even though I have my champ select music turned off. I even turned the volume all the way down. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: The login music is the same as the Waiting for match music right now. Disabling the login music will fix it but will not let you play music on the login screen.
Thanks so much. I couldn't figure out how to turn off all the unnecessary music. I like to tab out in que's and champ select to watch videos.
